name: .MI4 File Extension
summary: Learn about .MI4 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Firmware file used by various audio players that have the PortalPlayer chipset, including SanDisk, Philips, Samsung, and older iPod players; contains low-level software functions and themes that are used to run the audio player.

content: MI4 files are used to upgrade or change the themes of an audio player.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
